name: MTLCommandQueue
desc: A queue that organizes command buffers for the GPU to execute.

items.name: func makeCommandBufferWithUnretainedReferences() -> MTLCommandBuffer?
items.desc: Creates a command buffer that doesn't hold strong references to any objects required to execute the command buffer.

items.name: func makeCommandBuffer(descriptor: MTLCommandBufferDescriptor) -> MTLCommandBuffer?
items.desc: Creates a command buffer using the specified description.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The device from which the command queue was created.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the command queue.
